declarations.name: NotectlEditor
declarations.description: A modern, accessible rich text editor shipped as a single Web Component. Features immutable state, transaction-based architecture, and a plugin system that powers every feature.

members.name: commands

type.text: { toggleBold(): boolean | undefined; toggleItalic(): boolean | undefined; toggleUnderline(): boolean | undefined; undo(): void; redo(): void; selectAll(): void; }

members.description: Convenience accessors for common formatting commands.

members.name: getHTML
members.description: Returns sanitized HTML representation of the document.

members.name: setHTML

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: HTML string to set as content.

members.description: Sets the editor content from an HTML string (sanitized via DOMPurify).

members.name: getJSON
members.description: Returns the document as an immutable JSON-serializable Document object.

members.name: setJSON

parameters.name: doc
parameters.description: A Document object to set as editor content.

members.description: Replaces the editor content with the given Document object.

members.name: getText
members.description: Returns the plain text content of the editor.

members.name: isEmpty
members.description: Returns true if the editor contains only a single empty paragraph.

members.name: executeCommand

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of a registered command.

members.description: Executes a named command registered by a plugin.

members.name: setTheme

parameters.name: theme
parameters.description: A built-in preset ('light' | 'dark' | 'system') or a custom Theme object.

members.description: Changes the editor theme at runtime.

members.name: destroy
members.description: Tears down the editor, disconnects plugins, and cleans up DOM resources.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Placeholder text shown when the editor is empty.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: When present, puts the editor into read-only mode.

attributes.name: theme
attributes.description: Sets the built-in theme preset. Defaults to 'light'.

events.name: ready
events.description: Fired when the editor has been fully initialized and is ready for interaction.

events.name: focus
events.description: Fired when the editor content area receives focus.

events.name: blur
events.description: Fired when the editor content area loses focus.

events.name: stateChange

type.text: CustomEvent<{ oldState: EditorState; newState: EditorState; transaction: Transaction }>

events.description: Fired after every state transition, providing the old state, new state, and the applied transaction.

events.name: selectionChange
events.description: Fired when the cursor or selection changes.

cssProperties.name: --notectl-fg-muted
cssProperties.description: Muted foreground color for secondary text.

cssProperties.name: --notectl-border-focus
cssProperties.description: Border color when the editor is focused.

cssProperties.name: --notectl-primary-muted
cssProperties.description: Muted variant of the primary color.

cssProperties.name: --notectl-danger-muted
cssProperties.description: Muted variant of the danger color.

cssProperties.name: --notectl-shadow
cssProperties.description: Box shadow color for elevated surfaces.

cssProperties.name: --notectl-focus-ring
cssProperties.description: Focus ring color for keyboard navigation.

declarations.name: createEditor

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Optional editor configuration (plugins, theme, placeholder, etc.).

declarations.description: Factory function that creates and initializes a <notectl-editor> element.
